verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:1
verses.text: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:2
verses.text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:3
verses.text: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:4
verses.text: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:5
verses.text: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:6
verses.text: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:7
verses.text: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:8
verses.text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:9
verses.text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:10
verses.text: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:11
verses.text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:12
verses.text: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:13
verses.text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:14
verses.text: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:15
verses.text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:16
verses.text: Rejoice evermore.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:17
verses.text: Pray without ceasing.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:18
verses.text: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:19
verses.text: Quench not the Spirit.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:20
verses.text: Despise not prophesyings.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:21
verses.text: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:22
verses.text: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:23
verses.text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:24
verses.text: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:25
verses.text: Brethren, pray for us.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:26
verses.text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:27
verses.text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:28
verses.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.  The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
